text: @SecPompeo @GOPLeader How many weeks did you allow lies and disinformation to go on from the Trump Admin about #COVID19? How many people are going to get seriously ill or die because of the Trump Admin complete incompetence? When are you going to acknowledge your role in the pandemic.
